ResumeScreener.title: AI Resume Screener
ResumeScreener.subtitle: Upload your resume and optionally paste a job description.

coverLetter.title: Tailored Cover Letter
coverLetter.jdRequiredDesc: To generate a tailored cover letter, please re-analyze your resume with a job description.
coverLetter.jdRequiredNote: Paste the job description in the left panel and click "Analyze Resume" again.
coverLetter.readyDesc: Generate a professional cover letter specifically tailored to match your resume with the provided job description.

rewrite.title: AI Resume Fixer
rewrite.description: Use AI to rewrite your resume. We'll fix formatting, improve bullet points, and better align your experience with the target job.
rewrite.customPlaceholder: Optional: Add custom instructions (e.g., 'Emphasize my leadership roles', 'Keep it to 1 page')...

toast.missingResume: Original resume text is missing. Please upload again.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content: We collect only essential information to provide our services. Your data is encrypted, never sold, and you can delete your account anytime. AI processing is done securely with your consent.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.content: By using Get Back To U, you agree to use our services responsibly. AI feedback is guidance only - we don't guarantee specific outcomes. Your content remains yours.
